div.p: This Application Development Agreement ("Agreemen") is made and effective from and states the terms and conditions that govern the contractual agreement between Ideenkreise Tech Pvt Limited, Ernakulam, India, (the "Developer") and (the "Client"), who agrees to be bound by this Agreement.

WHEREAS, the Client has conceptualized which is described in further detail in Section 1-A (the "Scope of Work Specifications"), and the Developer is a contractor with whom the Client has come to an agreement to design, develop, create, test, and deliver the projects to the client.

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and promises made by the parties to these projects Development Agreement, the Developer and the Client (individually, each a "Party" and collectively, the "Parties") covenant and agree as follows:

1. DEVELOPER'S DUTIES: The Client hereby engages the Developer and the Developer hereby agrees to be engaged by the Client to develop the Software in accordance with the specifications attached hereto as Section-1A (the "Scope of Work & Specifications").
a. The Developer shall complete the development of the Project according to the mutually agreed phases by deputing competent manpower resources to the Client, whose work on the Project shall be jointly guided and coordinated by the Developer and the Client.
b. Except as expressly provided in this software Development Agreement, the client shall not be obligated under this agreement to provide any other support or assistance to the developer.
c. The Client may terminate this Software Development Agreement at any time upon a material breach of the terms herein and fail to cure such a breach within 10 days of notification of such a breach.
d. All work shall be performed in a professional manner. The developer shall arrange for such employees and/or contractors as resource.

2. DELIVERY: The Application shall function in accordance with Section-1 A (The "Scope of Work & Specifications”).
a. If the application as delivered does not conform with the Specifications, the Client shall within 10 days of the Delivery Date notify the Developer in writing of the ways in which it does not conform with the Specifications. The Developer agrees that upon receiving such notice, it shall make reasonable efforts to correct any non-conformity.
b. The Client shall provide to the Developer written notice of its finding that the Software confirms to the Specifications within 10 days of the Delivery Date unless it finds that the Software does not conform to the Specifications as described in Section-1 A herein.
c. After successful completion of the project, there shall be a sign-off to this effect between the Client and the Developer.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS / OWNERSHIP OF THE APPLICATION: The application shall be the sole property of the Client. The Parties acknowledge and agree that the Client will hold all intellectual property rights in the Application including, but not limited to, copyright and trademark rights. The Developer agrees not to claim any such ownership in the Application's intellectual property at any time prior to or after the completion and delivery of the Application to the Client. Developer will keep and maintain adequate and current written records/documentation with respect to the Application (in the form of source codes, notes, sketches, drawings, and as may otherwise be specified by the Client).

4. CHANGE IN SPECIFICATIONS: The client may request that reasonable changes be made to the Specifications and tasks associated with the implementation of the Specifications. If the Client requests such changes, Developer will use its best efforts to implement the requested change at no additional expense to Buyer and without delaying the delivery of the Application . In the event that the proposed change will, in the reasonable opinion of Developer, require a delay in delivery of the Application or would result in additional expense to Client, then Client and Developer shall confer and Client shall in its discretion, elect either to withdraw its proposed change or require Developer to deliver the Software with the proposed change and subject to the delay and/or additional expense.

5. CONFIDENTIALITY: The Developer shall not disclose to any third party the business of the Client, details regarding the Software, without limitation any information regarding the application's code, the Specifications, or the Client's business (the "Confidential Information”), (ii) make copies of any Confidential Information or any content based on the concepts contained within the Confidential Information for personal use or for distribution unless requested to do so by the Client, or (iii) use Confidential Information other than solely for the benefit of the Client.

6. DEVELOPER WARRANTIES: The Developer represents and warrants to the Client the following:
a. Development and delivery of the Application under this Agreement are not in violation of any other agreement that the Developer has with any another party.
b. The Application will not violate the intellectual property rights of any other party.
c. After the Delivery Date, the Application shall operate according to the Specifications. If the Application malfunctions or in any way does not operate according to the Specifications, then the Developer shall take all reasonably necessary steps to fix the issue and ensure that the Application operates according to the Specifications. After the development of the project, the client will be provided with months or hours of free services. During this period the client can check and report any issues regarding the functionality of the application. If such an issue is raised, then the team will take the necessary steps to resolve the issue.
d. After the months or hours period for extended support, the Client shall have the option to shift to an AMC (Annual Maintenance Contract). During the AMC Period, any modification which doesn't conflict with the existing functionality of the project shall be done for free. If there is no AMC in place, changes to the existing project are chargeable depending upon the nature of the work.

ul.li: As per the understanding between both parties, the phase's delivery time can be determined by the developers. And all the phases have to be delivered within the end date.

li.b: To facilitate the timely delivery of the application, in the event of uncertainty regarding any feature of the application the developer shall notify the client in advance and will schedule a meeting to rectify the doubt. The client should make necessary efforts to assist the developer without delaying the natural flow of application development. If the client fails to facilitate the assistance, needed to further the development it would also reflect on the timely delivery.

div.p: 7. DEVELOPMENT PROCEDURE: The Parties shall, conform to the following procedure in the sequence indicated:

ul.li: a. Scope: agrees to construct an application such that its features shall conform to the specifications set out in the Detailed SOW & proposal shared.

b. Price: agrees to deliver all functionality/ features specified in the Detailed SOW & Proposal for the projects development and the cost of development is specified below. The development dependencies like API, module purchases, Domain, Server cost, and any external cost or third-party cost are extra and are bound by the client. The proposed quote includes the design, development, etc. related to the application. Company details such as Logo, Designs, Contents, etc. will be provided by the client as and when requested.

c. Timeline : agrees to make all reasonable efforts to deliver the functionality specified in Section-1 A by (based on Indian working days) for WebApp modules after SRS. Also, payment as per agreed payment terms should be made for the timely progress of the activity. On receipt of the first instalment, a separate team with the Project Manager and Project Delivery Manager, who will be coordinating with the whole project thereon, will be allotted. Further updates will be provided by them going forward. In the unlikely event of the client terminating the project before completion, the client shall settle the entire outstanding amount based on the percentage of the project completed.
d. Payment Schedule: agrees to commence work on the Development immediately after receipt of 1st Instalment.

div.p: 8. INDEMNIFICATION: The Developer will not indemnify, defend, and protect the Client from and against all lawsuits and costs of every kind pertaining to the software including reasonable legal fees due to the Client's infringement of the intellectual rights of any third party. Similarly, the Client also will not indemnify, defend or protect the Developer from and against all lawsuits and costs of every kind pertaining to the software platforms, tools etc. used, including legal fees to be incurred if any due to the Developer's infringement of the intellectual property rights of any third party.
9. NO MODIFICATION UNLESS IN WRITING: No modification of this Agreement shall be valid unless in writing and agreed upon by both parties.

ul.li: a. This Agreement shall commence upon the effective date December 2023 and continue until all of the obligations of the parties have been performed or until earlier termination as provided herein.

b. Developer's appointment as Contractor pursuant to this Agreement and this Agreement shall terminate upon the occurrence of any of the following events:
(i) In the event either party defaults in any material obligation owed to the other party pursuant to this Agreement, then this Agreement may be terminated if the default is not cured following at least thirty days written notice to the defaulting party.
(ii) Principal Developer or Developers becomes become incapacitated.

c. Section 3 (Ownership of Application) and Section 5 (Confidentiality) shall survive the expiration or termination of this Agreement. In the event of early termination due to the Developer's default or disability, the Developer agrees to deliver the Software completed till then.

d. If the Agreement is terminated due to the disability of the Developer, then Developer (or Developer's executor, administrator or other representative) shall deliver that part of the Software then completed, provided payment is made by Client for such completed part.

div.p: This agreement is made under the laws of India. The formation, validity, construction, and performance of this agreement shall be governed by the law of India, which shall be commenced within the competent courts in Kochi. Any dispute arising out of this agreement shall be filed only in a court having jurisdiction in the city of Kochi.
